item.title: DCCI mourns Khaleda Zia’s demise
item.description: Dhaka Chamber of Commerce & Industry (DCCI) has expressed grief and deepest condolences at the death of former Prime Minister Khaleda Zia. On behalf of the business body and members of the Board of Directors, its President Taskeen Ahmed conveyed the condolences, according to a DCCI media release.

item.title: India’s Jaishankar to attend Khaleda’s funeral
item.description: Indian Minister of External Affairs S Jaishankar will fly to Dhaka to attend BNP chief Khaleda Zia’s last rites. Officials at the foreign ministry and Indian High Commission in Dhaka confirmed the matter on Tuesday.
